definition: to lead the way/to guide/to show the way/fig. to instruct
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: The bellboy will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 会有专门的服务员给您带路。

sentences.english: Zhang Yuelin paths ray qiao sister, sister qiao zealously to lead the way for it.
sentences.chinese: 张月林巧遇雷巧妹，巧妹热心地为其带路。

sentences.english: He let Jack lead the way.
This boy will show you the way.
With the young man leading, they started toward the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 由那位年轻人带路，他们开始朝山上进发。

sentences.english: With this cas well asle: I will light your way in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 用这蜡烛，俺将为您在黑黑暗带路。

sentences.english: Let the sun liuhe town six leading the way into the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 让孙六带路进入了就近的小镇六合镇。

sentences.english: As I knew where the hotel was, I decided to take them there.
sentences.chinese: 我知道那家旅馆在哪儿，所以决定给他们带路。

sentences.english: Angola lead the way, our team is our people.
sentences.chinese: 安哥拉带路，我们的球队就是我们的人民。

sentences.english: When gold's too bold, let shimmery silver lead the way.
sentences.chinese: 当黄金的太大胆，让闪闪银带路。

sentences.english: Li went and the guide policeman rode on motorcycle to find a tractor and we just sat on spot to take a rest.
sentences.chinese: 带路警察骑摩托和小李去找拖拉机，我们随地休息。

sentences.english: With the boy to lead the way, we will find the house easily tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 有那个男孩带路，明天我会很容易地找到这幢房子。

sentences.english: A:It's very good of you to show me the way.
sentences.chinese: 您给我带路真是太感谢了。

sentences.english: Whith a boy leading the way, they started towards the village.
sentences.chinese: 由一个男孩带路，他们朝村子走去。

sentences.english: He is the people's leading guide.
With thellos candle, I will light your way in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 用这烛炬，我将为你在暗中中带路。

definition: to open up a path/to make one's way through/to construct a road/(electricity) open circuit
to pass on a story/to communicate a message
to get out of the way/to step aside
to take the lead/to be first to start
